STEP_1.TITLE: 1. Extension Initialization and Audio Recording
STEP_1.DESCRIPTION: When the user initiates the chrome extension during a business or educational online meeting, the extension gains access to the audio input from the meeting platform and starts recording the speech.

STEP_2.TITLE: 2. Speech-to-Text Conversion
STEP_2.DESCRIPTION: The recorded speech is passed through a speech-to-text conversion module that utilizes NLP techniques. This module converts the audio into text format, making it suitable for further processing.

STEP_3.TITLE: 3. Summary Generation with ChatGPT Model
STEP_3.DESCRIPTION: The text data obtained from the speech-to-text conversion is fed into the ChatGPT model, which utilizes natural language processing and deep learning techniques. The ChatGPT model comprehends the content and generates a summary based on the input text.

STEP_4.TITLE: 4. Information Extraction and Insights
STEP_4.DESCRIPTION: The generated summary is processed to extract key information and relevant insights from the summarized text. This step helps to identify the most important points and highlights essential details for further analysis.

STEP_5.TITLE: 5. Visualization of Extracted Information
STEP_5.DESCRIPTION: The extracted information is visualized using suitable graphical representations such as pie charts or other visualization techniques. These visualizations provide a clear and concise representation of the summarized content, making it easier for the user to comprehend the key insights.

STEP_6.TITLE: 6. Presentation and Optional Features
STEP_6.DESCRIPTION: The chrome extension presents the summary and visualizations to the user within the browser interface. Additionally, the extension may offer optional features such as search functionality within the summary, keyword highlighting, or customization options for the visualizations. These features enhance the user experience and allow for further exploration and interaction with the summarized content.

UPLOAD.TITLE: Upload Your Receipt
UPLOAD.DESCRIPTION: Take a clear picture of your entire receipt. The receipt must include the name and date of purchase on the photo.
UPLOAD.NOTE: Note: Size of the receipt must be less than 5 MB.
UPLOAD.INSTRUCTION: Click on the box below to upload your receipt. One image will be accepted in JPG, PNG, or PDF format per entry.
UPLOAD.UPLOAD_TEXT:
Click here to upload receipt.
Please select one image.
JPG, PNG, or PDF are accepted.
